name: RADIUS DECAY
description:
By Darkmode.official,Proudly Developed by Bhargab Jyoti at Darkmode.official

This is a survival based endless runner with dangerous enemies which you have to dodge. This is the first version of this game. This game is very finely polished to give you the satisfying feedback form this game.

Features :

  • Camera Shake
  • Post-Processed
  • Color-Graded
  • Free to download
  • Easy to give feedback to the developer
